biogHist.p: Rev. John Marsh was dedicated as an infant and attended Sunday School at the First Parish Unitarian Church in Norwell, Massachusetts. He was an English literature major at the University of Massachusetts at Amherst and has a Master of Divinity degree from Harvard University. He is also a graduate of the World Council of Church's graduate school program in Bossey, Switzerland. Reverend Marsh was minister of the Unitarian Church of Edmonton for nine years before moving to San Francisco to become minister of the First Unitarian Universalist Society of San Francisco. Rev. Marsh is married to Alison Patrick.
